name: Hunchback of Notredame
description:
Back of Jewel Case - Playstation (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

The ugliest man in Paris, bell-ringer Quasimodo is mocked or ignored by everyone in the city. Then, one day, Quasimodo falls in love with the dancer, Esmeralda, and his life changes forever. As well as a great 50 minutes cartoon video, Hunchback of Notredame features an easy-to-use virtual colouring book and a challenging puzzle game. Can the hunchback find love?
